dataIdInfo.idAbs: Exports features from a FeatureClass to an Apache Avro file and Schema for import into Apache Hadoop.

tool.name: FeatureClassToAvro

param.name: output_folder
param.dialogReference: Choose a folder where the output Avro file will be produced. By default the avro filename will be the same as the feature class name with a *.avro suffix. The Avro schema file is also written to this folder with an *.avsc suffix.

param.name: use_wkb
param.dialogReference: Set to True to export the data as Well-Known Binary format. If False, the data will be exported as Well-Known Text format. Whichever format you choose the data will be compressed with the deflate algorithm.

tool.summary: Exports features from a FeatureClass to an Apache Avro file and Schema for import into Apache Hadoop.
